label: Fate Scoring
tooltip: Configure how fates are scored and selected.

bonus_fate_modifier.label: Bonus Fate Modifier
bonus_fate_modifier.tooltip: Set a score modifier to be added to any fates have a bonus.

unstarted_fate_modifier.label: Unstarted Fate Modifier
unstarted_fate_modifier.tooltip: Set a score modifier to be added to any fates that have not been started.

mob_fate_modifier.label: Mob Fate Modifier
mob_fate_modifier.tooltip: Set a score modifier to be added to any fates that have you slaying many mobs.

boss_fate_modifier.label: Boss Fate Modifier
boss_fate_modifier.tooltip: Set a score modifier to be added to any fates that have you defeating a boss.

collect_fate_modifier.label: Collect Fate Modifier
collect_fate_modifier.tooltip: Set a score modifier to be added to any fates that have you collecting items.

defend_fate_modifier.label: Defend Fate Modifier
defend_fate_modifier.tooltip: Set a score modifier to be added to any fates that have you defending an npc or objective.

escort_fate_modifier.label: Escort Fate Modifier
escort_fate_modifier.tooltip: Set a score modifier to be added to any fates that have you escorting an npc.

in_progress_fate_modifier.label: In Progress Fate Modifier
in_progress_fate_modifier.tooltip: Set a score modifier to be added to any fates that are currently in progress.

time_required_to_consider_fate.label: Seconds Required to Consider Fate
time_required_to_consider_fate.tooltip: After estimating the time it would take to reach a fate and complete it, only consider fates that would allow you to participate for at least this many seconds.
